E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/16/1978
Subject: Progress of Juan Bernhardt
Dear Sir,
Juan Bernhardt has nothing more to prove at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an AVG of .419 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
